SA15bsa075_u:611: yathā hi cakṣrurindriyaṃ svasāmarthyānatikrameṇa yogyadeśasthamarthamapekṣya svavijñānajanane pravartate,
SA15bsa075_u:612: tathā sarvāvidyāparipanthibhūtārthabhāvanāsahitaṃ mana indriyamapi yogyadeśasthamarthaṃ prāpya svavijñānajanane pravartiṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:618: tadavasthāyāṃ tu śrutinayanayoriva manaso 'pi kiyaddūreṇa viṣayasannidhivyavasthitika eva pramātuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:620: yāvattena śakyamadhigantuṃ svākārārpaṇasamartha sahakāri vastu tāvaditarajanāsādhāraṇaṃ truṭyadrūpatayā tasya gocarībhavatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:621: ata evārthākāro vastuto na bhāvanāmātrajanita iti na visaṃvādaśaṅkāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:622: bhāvanayā punastadīyasantāne netra ivāñjanaviśeṣeṇa śaktiratiśayavatī kācidarpitā yatparajanāsādhāraṇadarśanamasya /
SA15bsa075_u:628: api ca, arthasya hi ālambanapratyayatvamindriyāpekṣatvena vyāptam /
SA15bsa075_u:630: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūmamādhatte /
SA15bsa075_u:632: na ca bhāvanābalena kasyacidatīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:648: sati ca vyāptiśaithilye śaṅkāpi nyāyādāpatantī kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:651: ataḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāśikākārasya vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca vācaspateḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvādanaikāntikī /
SA15bsa075_u:654: prasiddhānumānasya ca na kṣatirdṛśyatvopādherdhūmādeḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptigrahaṇāvirodhāt /
SA15bsa075_u:658: na catīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vādarśane 'pi niṣeddhuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:661: kāraṇābhāvo 'pi adarśanamātrato na sidhyatīti tadavasthaḥ paribhavaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:668: na ca caturāryasatyasvarūpe vastutattve niścite sākṣātkāramantareṇa kleśajñeyāvaraṇakṣatiriti svārthamapi tāvad bhāvanā yuktimatī /
SA15bsa075_u:669: tattvasākṣātkāriṇi ca cittasantāne sati śakyasākṣātkriyamidamityanye 'pi niścayānantaraṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pravartyante,
SA15bsa075_u:670: tadupadiṣṭa svargasādhanaṃ cārthabhāvanayānusarantīti svargāpavargalakṣaṇaparārthasiddhaye ca bhāvanā saphaleti /
SA15bsa075_u:671: anyathā tattvāsākṣātkāriṇo lokānatikrāntasya vacanamanādeyameva syāditi kva parārthavārtāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:672: yacca kiṃ ca tatpramāṇamityādyārabhya tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti etatparyantena dharmādharmayoranumānāpravartanamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:675: tadā tasya pratyakṣeṇāniścaye 'pi yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalena vyāptisaṃvedanaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanāvasare vyavasthāpitam /
SA15bsa075_u:685: anumānena caikavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭe vastutattve 'vasite 'pi sarvātmanā spaṣṭavastutattvasākṣātkāri pratyakṣaṃ na gṛhītagrāhi,
SA15bsa075_u:687: na ca taduttarakālamityādi tu kāraṇānupalabdhidūṣaṇaprastāve prativyūḍhamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:688: yadapi vācaspatinā satyamityādinā punaḥ punaruttarottaramāśaṅkaya tat kimanumānena vahni vyavasthāpyetyādinā bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve visaṃvādamupadarśyopasaṃhṛtam,
SA15bsa075_u:692: tathā hyayaṃ vahniviṣayenumānapūrvakabhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭavahnipratyayaḥ kiṃ vahnerapyutpannaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:694: prathamapakṣe visaṃvādaśca bahulamupalabhyate iti yaduktaṃ taddurbhāṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:696_1: 'pi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ sākṣādutpannasya yogipratyakṣasyāpi visaṃvādasaṃbhava iti sthavīyasī bhrāntiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:703: na hi vayaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭavastubhāvanāsahitaṃ manaindriyamarthasvarūpagrāhijñānaṃ janayatīti brūmaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:713: purastāttu bhāvite parisphurati tadarthāpekṣayā bhrāntiḥ prāsarpakasyevetyādyupahāsyamapyasya kṣatātmano durnītipūtigavībhakṣaṇādhmātajaradgomāyorudgāra iva satāmasahyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:718: ato ghaṭāderapyālambanapratyayatvamaśakyāvagamamiti indriyapratyakṣamapi pratihataṃ syāditi / tathā, api (#
SA15bsa075_u:719: Nibandh 20#) cālambanapratyayā api ta eva yujyanta ityādirna punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhateti paryanto vyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:730: ata eva kāminīpratibhāsasyāpramāṇatve 'pyapratyakṣatve 'pi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyadharmasāmānyasya saṃbhavāt na viruddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:747: bhavatu vā, tathāpi yogijñānasya tena saha tulyahetutvamasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:749: yogijñānaṃ tu avidyāpratipakṣasarvavastutattvabhāvanāviṣayābhyāmutpannamiti mahāntamapi viśeṣamasau durmatiprapātapatito nāvagāhata ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:750: nyāyaprakīrṇe tu mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ yat,
SA15bsa075_u:752: yaccāpi cetyādyārabhya yogijñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ prasaktamityuktam tatra keyaṃ nirviṣayatā nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:765: vyāvahārikasya sphuṭībhāvo 'pi bahirabhimatasya paryante vikalpopādeyakṣaṇasyaiva sphuṭasyodayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:767: Nibandh 21#) viṣayastena sākṣātkṛta iti vyavahāraḥ kevalamarthādapyutpattau /
SA15bsa075_u:774: etena yat pāramārthikamityādi na sarvajñasiddhiritiparyantaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:775: yaccāpi cetyādi na yuktaṃ paśyāma itiparyantena dūṣaṇamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:777: tathā hi yādṛśa eva bhāvyagrāhī pratyayaḥ prathamo niranvayo niruddhastādṛśa evāpara utpadyata iti niyamaniścayakāraṇaṃ na kiñcidasti caṇḍadevatāsparśādanyat,
SA15bsa075_u:779: nanu kṣaṇikatvaṃ sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśotpādena,
SA15bsa075_u:780: taddhi prācīnaṃ niranvayanirodhe yathā sadṛśakṣaṇāntaramārabhate tathā svahetugatasāmarthyayogāt kāryotpādānumeyād yadi viśeṣaleśaviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇāntaramutpādayati,
SA15bsa075_u:782: na hi bhavata iva bhāvasyāpi kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pradveṣo nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:806_0: tathā hi caturāryasatyasākṣātkāraprāptau nirāvaraṇāntaḥ karaṇasya kāruṇyātiśayāt
SA15bsa075_u:806_1: sarvākāraparārthaparatayā sakalagocaracāriṇi cetasi ciravirūḍhotsāhasya tādṛgupāyaviśeṣādhigamo bhaviṣyati,
SA15bsa075_u:820: atha svarūpasannihitaṃ jñānameva tadākāramiti nirālambanaṃ niyamena /
SA15bsa075_u:826: yathā sa dṛṣṭaḥ śaradādikālayukta stathā tasya na bādhitatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:827: tatkālayuktastu na tena dṛṣṭa stathāpratītāvapi nāsti doṣaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:828: jñānamātrasya tu tattvataḥ sphuraṇācca na vartamānatāprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:829: tathā kṣaṇikatvapakṣe 'pi ekatvādhyāropasāmarthyānna vyavahārikaṃ prati pramāṇasya kācit kṣatiriti śāstre prapañcitam /
SA15bsa075_u:830: yadapi kiñcedamapi vaktumucitamityādyārabhya bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve 'pi pratyakṣapūrvakatve 'pi vyabhicārābhidhānam,
SA15bsa075_u:837: na deśakālavastuviśeṣamapāsya sāmānyena sarvadikkālavartivastumātraṃ kṣaṇikanirātmakamityaniścaye mahāprayāsasādhyapuruṣāyuṣavyāpinyāṃ bhāvanāyāmeva pravṛtterabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:838: na ca hāliko havyāśanamanumāya sphuṭīkarotiyena pratyakṣāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:844: sādhyatayaiva tādṝgdaśāviśeṣasya lokātikrāntātiśayasya paramapuruṣārtharūpasya sādhanaviśeṣapratipādanāya pṛthagjanasādhāraṇendriyajñānād bhedena nirdeśāt /
SA15bsa075_u:845: paramapuruṣārthaviṣayatvābhāvādeva ca rasāyanādisaṃskārajasyāpi jñānasya na pratyakṣāntaratā /
SA15bsa075_u:849: adhyavasāyo hi pūrvaṃ durllabhaḥ idānīṃ tu bhāvanābalanirdalitāvidye cittasantāne so 'pīndriyajñānena janyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:850: nanu yogino manovijñānendriyajñānābhyāṃ paśyata ākāradvayasphuraṇaprasaṅga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:853: atastāvākārāvapratimau kayā gatyā spharata iti ko nirṇetuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:856: sarvathā tu na yogijñānasya kṣatiriti siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:858: nanu yadi nāma yuṣmadabhimatasyānumānasya na bādhakam,
SA15bsa075_u:870: nihantuṃ hetavaḥ śaktāḥ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:873: sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:874: atrocyate / kimete jñeyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena sākṣādviruddhāḥ paramparayā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:876: sa ca sākṣād virodha parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo vā,
SA15bsa075_u:888: yasya hyavikalakāraṇasya bhavato yatsannidhānādabhāvastayoreva sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:889: na ca sarvajñatvaṃ prāk pravṛttamavikalakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena paścājjñeyatvādisadbhāve nivartata iti syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:890: tathātve sati deśādiniṣedya eva bhavenna tu sarvathoccheda iti /
SA15bsa075_u:892: sa hi bhavan niṣedhyasya sarvajñatvasya vyāpakaviruddhatvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:910: yathā māyākāro nirmitāśvādiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ nirviṣayatvena niścinvannabhrāntaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:912: tathā bhagavānapi śuddhalaukikavikalpasammukhībhāve 'pi na bhrānto nāpi pṛthagjanasamāna iti /
SA15bsa075_u:922: vikalpenaikasya kasyacidāmukhīkṛtvopadeśe 'pi nirvikalpena sarvamavabudhyamānasya vacanānāṃ sarvajñabhāṣitatvādeva //
SA15bsa075_u:939: viśvāsaśca na tāsu syātkenaitāḥ kīrtitā iti //
SA15bsa075_u:940: kinnu buddhapraṇītāḥ syuḥ kiṃ vā brāhyaṇavañcakaiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:946: atha vā yathā cakrasyoparate 'pi daṇḍapreraṇāvyāpāre pūrvāvegavaśād bhramaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:947: evaṃ bhagavati pratyastamitasamastavikalpajāle 'pi sthite yadi pūrvapraṇidhānāhitasatatānābhogavāhinī deśanā syāttadā ko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:951: tasmād yathā pūrvābhyāsato jhaṭiti prabodhitasyāriṇā prahārādidānenānurūpa eva prakramaḥ śastroddharaṇādikaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:956: yatpunaruktam piśācādikṛtaśaṅkayā nātrāśvāsaḥ satāṃ yukta iti /
SA15bsa075_u:967: taccet krīḍanaśīlānāṃ rakṣasāṃ vā vaco bhavet /
SA15bsa075_u:979: tadetad vyāpakaviruddhakāryabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñābhāvaṃ sādhayati paramparayā viruddhatvāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:992: tataśca viśiṣṭavyavahārasya sāṃkaryeṇa na tatraikāntena rāgānumānaṃ yujyate /
SA15bsa075_u:994: asaṃmukhībhūtarāgādayo 'pi hi svābhimatadevatāstutividhāne mātrādigurujanasaṃbhāṣaṇādau ca vacanamātramuccārayantaḥ samupalabhyante /
SA15bsa075_u:995: na ca yadyadabhāve bhavati tasya tatkāryatocyate,
SA15bsa075_u:1002: yadi kāraṇaguṇādisakalatadanyakāraṇabhāve 'pi rāgādi yogyatābhāvānnotpadyate vacanamiti sidhyettasyāḥ kāraṇatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:1017: kāruṇikasyāpi niṣphalārambho na yukta iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:1022: nanu nirvikalpasya bhagavataḥ kathaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ karuṇāsaṃbhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1024: tataśca kāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kāryasaṃbhava iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:1031: utpāde tu phalasya hetuniyamo no tu prabandhasthitau
SA15bsa075_u:1036: nanu yadi nāmaivaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvena sahāviruddhaṃ dehendriyabuddhyādiyogitvaṃ tu viruddhameva /
SA15bsa075_u:1040: dehādīnāṃ hetutve 'pi naiṣāṃ kevalānāṃ sahakārimātrāṇāmātmābhiniveśalakṣaṇopādānakāraṇavikalānāṃ rāgādijanakatvamityagamakā eva dehādayaḥ sarvajñābhāvasya /
SA15bsa075_u:1043: tathā hi yadyapi teṣāṃ sati prāmāṇye 'numāna evāntarbhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:1047: na ca vaidikaṃ kiñcidvacanaṃ sarvanarāsarvajñatvapratipādaka mupalabhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1048: pratyuta nimittanāmni śākhāntare sphuṭatarameva sarvajñaḥ pratipāditaḥ / tathā hi
SA15bsa075_u:1049: sa vetti viśvaṃ na ca tasya vettā
SA15bsa075_u:1052: tathā hi smaryamāṇameva gavādivastu purovartigavayādisādṛśyopādhi gavādyupādhi vā sādṛśyamupamānena pratīyata iti sthitiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1053: na ca sarvajñasantānavartīni cetāṃsi kenacit sarvajñenānubhūtāni yataḥ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyeran,
SA15bsa075_u:1063: yato dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyata iti adṛṣṭārthaṃparikalpanamarthāpattirucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1064: na cāsarvajñatvamantareṇa sarvanareṣu kaścidartho dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā nopapadyate yatastadarthāpattyā parikalpyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:1072: tathā hi yathā saṃsārasyānāditve pūrvapūrvavastusattāyā anavadhitvaṃ tathā sarvajñajñānasyāpi pūrvapūrvavastusattāvyāpakatvenānavadhiprasaratā iti /
SA15bsa075_u:1085: yacca na kiñcit tatkathaṃ prameyaṃ paricchindyāt,
SA15bsa075_u:1102: kiṃ ca, kaḥ punarayaṃ pramāṇābhāvo 'bhimato bhavatām /
SA15bsa075_u:1111: nanu tathāpi sadvyavahārārthaṃ sādhakamapyasya na vidyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1112: tathā hi sarvavido 'tīndriyatvāt na tāvadasmadādipratyakṣamasya sādhakam /
SA15bsa075_u:1114: na cāyaṃ kālāntare 'bhūditi ca kalpanā yujyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1115: yathā hi kālatvādidānīntanakālavaditi anenānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:1124: kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane sarvo hetuḥ trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātivartate asiddhatvaṃ viruddhatvamanaikāntikatvaṃ ceti /
SA15bsa075_u:1125: tathā hi sarvajñe dharmiṇi kriyamāṇe na taddharmo hetuḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1134: dṛṣṭo na caikadeśo 'sti liṅgaṃ yo vānumāpayet / iti //
SA15bsa075_u:1137: tatra pauruṣeyopyāgamaḥ tadīyo vā tatra pramāṇam,
SA15bsa075_u:1145: kiṃ ca sarvajñapraṇītādvacanāt sarvajñasiddhau kimaparāddhaṃ svavacanena yenāto 'pyasau na gamyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:1157: na cāpyevaṃ paro nityaḥ śakyo labdhumihāgamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1159: āgamasya ca nityatve siddhe tatkalpanā vṛthā /
SA15bsa075_u:1173: dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyate iti adṝṣṭārthaparikalpanamarthāpattilakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:1174: na cātra pramāṇapratītaṃ kiñcid vastvasti yatsarvajñamantareṇānupapadyamānaṃ tatsattāmupanayet /
SA15bsa075_u:1179: yadapīdaṃ kārikābṛhaṭṭīkayorekaṣaṣṭyā ślokaiḥ sarvajñasiddhaye bauddhasya sādhanamāśaṅkaya dūṣitaṃ tadapi ghṛṇākaramiti granthavistarabhayānna likhitam /
SA15bsa075_u:1181: tathā hyetāni kila saugataiḥ sarvajñasādhanāya sādhanānyabhidhīyante
SA15bsa075_u:1190: tadevaṃ sarvathā sarvajñasādhakapramāṇāsabhavādayukto bauddhānāṃ sarvajñe sadvyavahāra iti //
SA15bsa075_u:1208: ayaṃ ca bhāṣyakārīyaḥ sarvasarvajñaprasādhakaprayogaḥ paṇḍitajitāribhiḥ prapañcita iti tata eva pracayato 'badhārya iti /
SA15bsa075_u:1226: vidveṣiṇi viṣajvālā kiñcijjñe tu na kiñcana //
SA15bsa075_u:1227: ihaite naiyāyikādayo vivādapadasya kṣitidharādeḥ svarūpopādānopakaraṇasaṃpradānaprayojanavibhāgapravīṇaṃ sarvajñatādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣaviśeṣamicchanti / yadāhuḥ
SA15bsa075_u:1230: sa ca kathaṃ sidhyatīti paryanuyuktāḥ sādhanamidamācakṣate /
SA15bsa075_u:1242: sa ca saṃkṣepato vibhajyamāno dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate /
SA15bsa075_u:1247: kṣmāruhādau dharmiṇi pramāṇasamadhigate kāryatvasya sādhanasya pramāṇapratītatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:1248: cirotpannaparvatādau ca dharmiṇi kāryatvaṃ sāvayavatvena hetunā boddhavyam / tad yathā
SA15bsa075_u:1255: nanu sāvayavatvena hetunā dravyāṇāmeva kāryatvaṃ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:1259: teṣāṃ kāryaguṇāditvena hetvantareṇa kāryatvamadhigantavyam / tathā hi
SA15bsa075_u:1270: tacca śabdādiṣviva pradhvaṃsādāvapi pratyakṣeṇādhigatamiti na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:1272: tathā hi yo vipakṣa eva vartate sa khalu sādhyaviparyayavyāpteḥ sādhyaviruddhaṃ sādhayan viruddho 'bhidhīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1281: sarvajñapūrvakatve tu sādhye vyāptiḥ svapne 'pi nopalabddhā /
SA15bsa075_u:1284: viruddhatā ca hetorasarvajñapūrvakatvenaiva kumbhādau kāryatvasya vyāpterupalabdheḥ /

SA15bsa075_u:4869: tadāpi teṣāṃ svarūpasya nirbhāso 'sti na vā /
SA15bsa075_u:4874: uktam / tasya cetarapratyakṣeṣviva vikalpe 'pi svīkāre viruddhavyāptopalambhena vikalpabhrāntatvayordūramapāstatvādvikalpe 'pi tvanmate pratyakṣatvamakṣatam /
SA15bsa075_u:4879: atha vipakṣādirartho 'smin prakāśata iti vācā svarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ kathitamiti mātā me bandhyeti vṛttāntaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4880: iṣyate ca tvayā vipakṣādisvarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ bikalpasyeti pratyakṣatānatikramaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:4882: tataśca tatpratibhāsino 'pi rūpasya sata eva khyātirnāsatkhyātiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4883: na ca tadeva vikalpe parisphuradrūpamasatāmīśvarādīnāṃ svarūpam,
SA15bsa075_u:4892: yadi nādhyakṣatā tasya rūpanirbhāsa eva na /
SA15bsa075_u:4894: yadi tu pratibhāseta rūpamasya sadeva tat /
SA15bsa075_u:4923: tathā hi jñānaṃ kenacidākāreṇa satyenālīkena vopajātaṃ nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:4925: tatkṛtatve na tāvat tatkāla eva vyāpārāntaramanubhūyata iti kutastadāropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4926: kālāntare ca svayamevāsat kasya vyāpāraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:4927: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaramapi nākārāroparāgasaṅginīmutpattimantareṇa vyāpārāntareṇa kvacit kiñcitkaraṃ nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:4932: tatra buddhau yadi svarūpeṇa sphurati satyapratītirevāsau, ka āropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4933: atha na parisphurati tathāpi ka āropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4938: na hi marīcisphuraṇameva jalasphuraṇamiti na svākāre bāhyāropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4958: bhedena pratītiniṣedhamātre 'pi na bāhyasya pratītirukteti kutastadadhyavasāyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:4959: yadi hi bāhyaṃ prakāśeta ekatvenānekatvena vā satā asatā vā pratītiriti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:4964: niraṃśatvādvastunaḥ sarvātmanā pratibhāso 'pratibhāso veti śāstramevātra vistareṇa parīkṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:4967: tathā hi kiṃ bāhye gṛhyamāṇe 'gṛhyamāṇe vā /
SA15bsa075_u:4971: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye pravṛttiniyamo na syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:4981: na hi nīlaṃ pītaṃ śakyaṃ grahītuṃ kartuṃ vā śilpakuśalenāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:4989: na hi kṣaṇikaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ kramavantau grahaṇasamāropau kartumarhati /
SA15bsa075_u:4990: uttarasmiṃstu kalpe 'vikalpasvasaṃvedanapratyakṣādvikalpākārādahaṅkārāspadādanahaṅkārāspadaḥ samāropyamāṇo vikalpena svagocaro na śakyo 'bhinnaḥ pratipattum /
SA15bsa075_u:5008: na tvātmā vedyamānaḥ samāropito nārthaḥ samāropyamāṇaḥ pratyakṣavedyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5009: sa ca samāropaḥ sato 'sato vā grahaṇameva /
SA15bsa075_u:5011: svapratibhāsasya bāhyādbhedāgraho bāhyasamāropastato bāhye vṛttiriti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:5012: sa kiṃ gṛhyamāṇe bāhye na vā /
SA15bsa075_u:5015: agṛhyamāṇe tu bhedāgrahe na pravṛttiniyamaḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:5017: tasmād yathā yathāyamadhyavasāyaścintyate tathā tathā viśīryata eva /
SA15bsa075_u:5018: tathā vikalpāropābhimānagrahaniścayādayo 'pyadhyavasāyavat svākāraparyavasitā eva sphuranto bāhyasya vārtāmātramapi na (#
SA15bsa075_u:5019: Nibandh 136#) jānantītyadhyavasāyasvabhāvā eva śabdapravṛttimittabhede 'pi tatkathaṃ yuktyāgamabahirbhūto 'nātmasphuraṇamācakṣīta /
SA15bsa075_u:5021: vikalpa ityadhyavasāyaityāropa ityabhimāna iti graha iti niścaya ityādikaṃ śāstre pratipadaṃ pratipāditam,
SA15bsa075_u:5024: tathā hi savareva prakārairaviparītasvarūpasaṃvedanād bhrānteratyantamabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:5029: prakāśamāno vā kathamasau tasyāṃ na prakāśate /
SA15bsa075_u:5034: nityaḥ śabda iti sarvātmanā ca niścayaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:5035: gauriti spaṣṭena ca svena lakṣaṇena prakāśeta /
SA15bsa075_u:5036: svalakṣaṇe ca saṅketāyogāt vikalpikaiva sā buddhirna syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:5037: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakāśanamasyā gavārthāvasāya ityeṣṭavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:5044: tathā hi kā punariyaṃ bhrāntirasatkhyātiratasmiṃstadgraho vā yadabhāvādidānīmeva muktirāsajyate /
SA15bsa075_u:5048: yasya svarūpanirbhāso bādhakād yadi tanna sat /
SA15bsa075_u:5054: nānyā va bhāvinītyatra pramāṇaṃ kiñcidasti vaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5059: śāstre ca atasmiṃstadgrahāt svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyād dṛśyavikalpyayorekīkaraṇād bhrāntiruktā /
SA15bsa075_u:5060: tāmayaṃ samarthayitumasamarthaḥ svātantryeṇālīkasphuraṇaṃ bhrāntiriti kāvyaṃ viracayya vistārayati //
SA15bsa075_u:5061: nanvatasmiṃstadgraho 'pi bhramaḥ svākāraparyavasitajñānādatirikto bahubhirbahudhā vicāryaṃ pratyākhyātaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5062: tat kathaṃ tasminnapi pakṣe na bhrāntikṣatiryenedānīmeva muktiprasaṅgo na syāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:5068: ayameva ca saṃsārastatkṣayo mokṣa iti kvedānīmeva tadvārtāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:5069: tathā hi vicitrānādivāsanāvaśāt prabodhakapratyayaviśeṣāpekṣayā vikalpaḥ kenacidākāreṇopajāyamāna eva bahirmukhapravṛttyanukūlamarthakriyāsmaraṇābhilāṣādiprabandhamādhatte /
SA15bsa075_u:5074: yathā candrādijñānasya bhrāntasyābhrāntasya vā taddarśanāvasāyajananameva grahaṇavyāpāraḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5079: nanu tathā ca tacca tena pratipādyate na ca tajjñāne tat prakāśata iti śapathenāpi na saṃpratyaya iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:5081_0: na hyadhyavasāyād bāhyasya paṭādervastuno bādhakāvatārāt pūrvasandigdhavastubhāvasya
SA15bsa075_u:5081_1: kṣaṇikāderavastuno vā śaśaviṣāṇāderasphuraṇe 'pi siddhipratibandho brahmaṇāpi pratividhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5086: tataśca tena ca tat pratipādyate na ca jñāne tatprakāśa iti saṅgatirastyeva,
SA15bsa075_u:5089: nanu yadi nādhyavaseyapratītistadāgṛhīte 'pi svalakṣaṇādau pravṛttiriti sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa prasajyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:5100: tathehāpi hutavahākārasya vikalpasya dāhapākādyarthakriyārthinastatsmaraṇavato hutavahaviṣayāyāmeva pravṛttau sāmarthyaṃ pramāṇapratītaṃ kathamatiprasaṅgabhāgi /
SA15bsa075_u:5103: nanu ca sādṛśyāropeṇa kiṃ svākārasya bāhye svākāre vā bāhyasyāropaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5107: kiṃ tarhi, svavāsanāparipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva sā buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhayaṃ bāhaye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva saṃsārātmikā ca /
SA15bsa075_u:5115: sa ca niyamo yathā darśanād vastupratibandhakṛtaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:5116: tathā vikalpaviśeṣādapi pāramparyeṇa vastuprativastupratibandhakṛta ityadarśane 'pi adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiryujyata iti nānumānamanavasthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:5125: tato yadyapi tattvena nāropo nāma kasyacit /
SA15bsa075_u:5128: bhrama eva hi saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ tattvasaṃsthitiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:5130: tataśca yāvanna vicārasaṃbhavo bhavo 'yamanyaḥ śama ityayaṃ nayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5131: vicāralīlālalite tu mānase bhavaḥ śamo vā ka iheti kathyatām //
SA15bsa075_u:5133: na cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha /
SA15bsa075_u:5134: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām //
SA15bsa075_u:5136: nirvāṇaṃ ca bhavaścaiva dvayameva na vidyate /
SA15bsa075_u:5139: yadapyuktaṃ vikalpasyāviṣayaśca bāhyam grahaṇaṃ cāsya śabdena saṃyojyeti vikalpatvamapi duryojam,
SA15bsa075_u:5140: ātmani ca śabdayojanā nāstīti vikalpo nāma nāstyeva,
SA15bsa075_u:5143: ihāgniratretyadhyavasāyo yathā kāyikīṃ vṛttiṃ prasūte tathāgnirmayā pratīyata iti vācikīmapi prasūte,
SA15bsa075_u:5145: evaṃ ca sati yathā vikalpenāyamartho gṛhīta iti niścayaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:5150: na śabdaiḥ saṃsargaḥ kvacidapi bahirvā manasi vā-
SA15bsa075_u:5153: vidhatte tau bāhye vacasi ca vikalpasthitirataḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:5154: abhāne pratibhāne vā na cāropo 'pi kasyacit /
SA15bsa075_u:5159: saṅketaḥ kṛta ityāsthā tādṛk śabdaśrutau punaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5162: tasmād vastu vā ghaṭapaṭādi sandigdhavastu vā sādhakabādhakātikrāntam,
SA15bsa075_u:5166: tasmādadhyavasāyasyākāraviśeṣayogādagṛhīte 'pi pravartanayogyatā nāma yo dharmastayā bāhyādhyavasāyayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaścet saṃvṛttyā duṣpariharaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:5167: tadā viṣayiviṣayabhāvo 'pi labdha ityadhyavasāyamātreṇa viṣayaviṣayitvamuktamiti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:5170: etena yaduktam kathamavasīyamānastayātmārtho na prakāśyata ityādi,
SA15bsa075_u:5177: na caikākārollekhino vikalpasyākārāntare pravartanaśaktiranubhavaviṣaya iti kutaḥ śabdapramāṇāntarānapekṣeti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:5180: yathā ca bāhye sati kvacid bhramavyavasthā tathāntarnaye 'pi sarvatra /
SA15bsa075_u:5181: kevalaṃ bahirmukhapravṛtyapekṣayā kriyamāṇo nātmani kaścid bhrama ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:5185: vikalpikaiva na syāditi tu svarūpāpekṣayā siddhasādhanam /
SA15bsa075_u:5187: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakhyānamasyā gavāvasāya ityeṣṭavyamityapi neṣṭavyameva,
SA15bsa075_u:5189: na hi vikalpabuddhāvalīkākārasphuraṇameva bāhyasyādhyabasāya iti kācidarthasaṅgatiḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:5193: apratibhāsamānasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya bhrāntyāvasāyāditi tu na budhyāmahe /
SA15bsa075_u:5212: tadevamapratibhāsino 'pi vipakṣādadhyavasāyamātrasiddhādeva vyāvṛtto doṣatrayanirmuktaḥ prakāśamānatātmako heturyāvatprakāśāvadhijñānātmakacitrākāracakrasyaikatvaṃ sādhayatyeva //
SA15bsa075_u:5226: tannāstu sādhyo dṛṣṭānto na ca śaṅkāviparyaye /
SA15bsa075_u:5230: sthaulyenāpyaṇuśo na hi kvacididaṃ svapne 'pi nirbhāsanam /
SA15bsa075_u:5242: sa hi nīlādiko 'rtho jaḍo vijñānāntarātmālīkasvabhāvo vā svīkartavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5244: tathā hi jñānasya prakāśakatvaṃ nāma kiṃ vidyamānatvaṃ vyāpārāveśo vā /
SA15bsa075_u:5249: atha jñānatve sati vidyamānatvamiti saviśeṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:5251: yena sattāmātreṇa samasamayaṃ sphuratorvijñānanīlādyoḥ pratijñāmātrādekasya jaḍatvālīkatvabādhyatvāprakāśatvādi vyavasthāpyate /
SA15bsa075_u:5252: atha dvitīyastadā sa kiṃ vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣasyātmā jñānāntaram,
SA15bsa075_u:5255: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaraṃ yadyanyaviṣayam arthasya na kiñcit /
SA15bsa075_u:5258: tṛtīye punaḥ saṅkalpe nīlādikaṃ kṛtameva syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:5263: caturthe tu vikalpe arthāntare kṛte nīlādikaṃ tadavasthameva /
SA15bsa075_u:5266: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva jñānajñeyayorapi svābhāviko grāhyagrāhakabhāvo vaktavyaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:5267: pramāṇasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvavad grāhyagrāhakasvarūpayoradyāpi nirvaktumaśakyatvāditi kva nīlādivārtāpi yadbhedasiddhipratyāśā pratyakṣataḥ sampadyate //
SA15bsa075_u:5270: tacca yadi pratyākāraṃ bhinnaṃ tadā sarveṣāṃ svasvarūpanimagnatvāccitraprakāśapraṇāśaprasaṅga ityuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:5281: ata eva svasaṃvedanapratyakṣādanumānācca ekatvasiddhau na pratyakṣāntaram /
SA15bsa075_u:5294: yadā punarākāracakrameva prameyam svasaṃvedanaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tadā tenaiva nīlādīnāṃ svabhāvabhūtenākhaṇḍātmanā ekīkṛtānāṃ kathamapramādī bhedamācakṣīta /
SA15bsa075_u:5296_0: tathāpi kathaṃ bhedastasmād yathordhvamindriyapratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇabhede pratīte 'pyavidyāvaśādekatvādhyavasāyaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:5297: yadyevaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsato vijñānākāracakravad vyāpto 'pi na bhidyeteti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:5299: buddhyākārakadambake tūktakrameṇa svasaṃvedanādisiddhaikatve 'nekatvasya pratyākhyānād bādhakāvatāra eva nāsti /
SA15bsa075_u:5300: tasmād vijñānatve satīti hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyam yena bāhyasyaiva bhedaḥ sidhyati //
SA15bsa075_u:5301: nanu yadi vijñānātmakaṃ vicitrākāracakramekaṃ tadā nīlākāra eva pītādyākāravṛndaṃ praviśet /
SA15bsa075_u:5309: tato 'pi viparyayasya bhedasya siddheḥ prasaṅgo 'pyasaṅgataḥ ityadvaitameva /
SA15bsa075_u:5310: kiṃ ca evaṃ sthūlanīlādyākāro 'pi paramāṇumātre praviśedityapratibhāsaṃjagadāpadyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:5314: tathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvavastutvādibhirabhede kṛtakatvamevānityatvameva vā syādityapi prasaṅgo vaktavya āpadyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:5317: yadyevaṃ prakāśanīlādyorapyayameva kramo jāgartītyekāvaśeṣaprasaṅgo bālapralāpaḥ / tadevaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:5320: buddhistu naśyati bhidaiva vidaiva sattvāccitrāpyato na bhidameti kimatra kurmaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:5325: buddheḥ svavittiniṣṭhāyāḥ yaḥ parastasya kā gatiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:5329: neṣṭaṃ tadapi cet tarhi kvāṇvantarbhidi bhāsanam /
SA15bsa075_u:5330: na parīkṣākṣamaṃ cāṇuḥ kutastasya tadā bhidā //
SA15bsa075_u:5343: vastuvyavasthā śaraṇaṃ kiṃ tu mānena saṅgatam //
SA15bsa075_u:5345: yasya rāśiranekaṃ syānnāpi vastu ca kiñcina //
SA15bsa075_u:5351: tathāpi ca jñānamayaḥ prakāśaḥ pratyakṣapakṣastu tavāvirāsīt //
SA15bsa075_u:5376: na cecchāmātrasya svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya svasaṃvedanenānyena vābhāvaḥ śakyāvagamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5377: yathā hi vahnimātrasya deśakālavyavahitasyāpi dhūmotpādadeśakālayoryadi syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti saṃbhāvitasyānumātṛpuruṣendriyapratyakṣeṇa (#
SA15bsa075_u:5378: Nibandh 146#) dhūmotpādāt prāgabhāve 'vadhāryamāṇastadutpattisiddhimadhyāsayatīti vyavahitadeśakālasyāpi vahnerdhūmamātraṃ prati kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇam,
SA15bsa075_u:5380: tathātrāpīcchācittaṃ parasantānasādhāraṇamapi yāvadyadīya syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti yadi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyeta tadā tadvyatirekasiddhidvāreṇa kāraṇatayāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa075_u:5385: yasminneva hi śuklaśaṅkhādideśe svacittaṃ śuklākārapratibhāsi svasaṃvedanena vedyate taddeśavartyeva pītākārapratibhāsi parasantānabhāvi cittaṃ na vedyate /
SA15bsa075_u:5388: na hyagnirapyeko yenaivendriyavijñānena dṛśyate tenaivānyo 'pi dṛśyam /
SA15bsa075_u:5389: tatra yathā cakṣurvijñānamātrāpekṣayā agnimātraṃ dṛśyamiti vyavasthāpyate tathātrāpi svasaṃvedanamātrāpekṣayā icchācittamātraṃ svaparasantānasādhāraṇamapi dṛśyameveti /
SA15bsa075_u:5390: atrocyate / kimatra mātraśabdenānumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāmaviśeṣitaṃ yasya kasyacit puruṣasyendriyajñānaṃ vastuviṣayīkurvāṇamasya dṛśyatāsaṃbhave 'pinānimitamabhimatam /
SA15bsa075_u:5392: so 'pi hi kasyacit puṃso yogyādeḥ svajātīyasya vā piśācāntarasya bhavatyevendriyajñānagocara iti na kaścit svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:5393: tasmādanumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhitvamanapāsya vijñānasya svalakṣaṇādibhedanirāsapara eva mātraśabdo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5396: ityādi / tenaivaṃ dṛśyatāsaṃbhāvanā yadīha deśe kāle vā syād ghaṭādirniyamenopalabhyeta,
SA15bsa075_u:5399: yadīha paracittaṃ syāt niyamena madīyasya svasaṃveda(na)
SA15bsa075_u:5402: tadānumānakāle 'pi dṛśyatayā saṃbhāvya tadanupalambhenābhāvasādhane kathamanumānaṃ pravartayitumidamārabdham,
SA15bsa075_u:5407: kiṃ tu tasya dṛśyānupalambhājjijñāsitaviśeṣe dharmiṇi bādhitasya kathamanumānamityuktameva //
SA15bsa075_u:5410: icchācittamātre 'pi svaparasantānasādhāraṇe sādhye yadyanupalambhamātreṇa dṛśya viśeṣaṇānapekṣeṇa pratibandhasiddhisamaye tasyābhāvaḥ pratīyate,
SA15bsa075_u:5411: tadā pakṣīkṛte dharmiṇi tatheti sa eva doṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5412: atha na pratīyate tadā sandigdhavyatireko hetvābhāso vyāhārādiriti sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:5413: evaṃ tarhi santānāntarasādhakasyābhāvād bādhakasyāpi kasyacidadarśanādbhavatu tatra sandeha eveti kecit /
SA15bsa075_u:5415: yadi hi santānāntaraṃ saṃbhavet tadā tato bhedena svasantānasyāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:5416: anyathā svasantānādapi prakāśamānāttasya parasantānābhimatasya bhedo na syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:5417: na cābhedastayoriti svasantānād bhedābhedābhyāmabādhyasya parasantānasya sāmānyaśaśaviṣāṇādivadabhāva evāyāta iti kathaṃ sandehaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5419: sa ca bhedaḥ santānasya svabhāvaḥ svasantāne pratibhāsamāne niyamena pratibhāseta /
SA15bsa075_u:5422: bhedapratibhāse hi upagamyamāne tadavadhibhūtasyāpi parasantānasya pratibhāso durapahnavaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:5424: sāvadherasya bhāsaḥ syānna vā grāhyaṃ tadātmanā //
SA15bsa075_u:5427: yathā hi svasantānamātre parisphurati śaśaviṣāṇādasphurato na bhedaḥ pratibhāti tathā parasantānādapi sphuraṇavirahiṇo na bhātyeva bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5428: na hi parasantānāpekṣayā kaścid viśeṣaleśaḥ svasantānasya parisphurati yo nāsti śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā /
SA15bsa075_u:5429: na ca śaśaviṣāṇaparasantānāvapekṣya samāne svasantānapratibhāse śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā na bhedo nāpyabhedaḥ pratibhāti /
SA15bsa075_u:5430: parasantānāpekṣayā tu bheda eva bhātītyevamavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa075_u:5431: bhedābhedayorabhāvaparihāreṇa hi yathā bhedo vyavasthitaḥ tadvad bhedapratibhāso 'pi bhedābhedābhāvapratibhāsavilakṣaṇa evocito bhavitum,
SA15bsa075_u:5442: tataścātraiva sandeho na bahirartha iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:5445: kadācidasau nāstyeva na cāsāvavabhāsata ityapi vaktuṃ śakteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5446: kiṃ ca mā nāma bhāsīṣṭa bahirarthaḥ kasyacidapi tathāpi kathaṃ tadabhāvasiddhirbhedapratibhāsābhyupagamavādina itīyanmātramiha vivakṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:5448: tasmād bahirarthena sādhāraṇaṃ santānāntaramiti kathaṃ vijñaptivādināmapi saṃmataṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA15bsa075_u:5449: kiṃ ca kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi vijñānadvayasya bhedapratibhāsavādinā bādhitumaśakyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:5450: pūrvabhāvinī hi saṃvittiḥ parasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ pūrvatvaṃ cātmano gṛhṇātyevāvadhipratibhāsavigame 'pi //
SA15bsa075_u:5451_0: parabhāvinyapi saṃvittiḥ pūrvasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ paratvaṃ cātmano 'dhigacchatyeva
SA15bsa075_u:5453: iti bhagavato vārtikakārasya vacanena phalitamatra mate /
SA15bsa075_u:5454_1: prativādino bhedagrahaṇamanumanyamānena santānāntarasandehaṃ ca vinā kathamuttaritavyaṃ bhavatā //
SA15bsa075_u:5463: yathā ca yadupalabhyamānaṃ yenaṃ rūpeṇa na bhāsate na tat tena rūpeṇa sadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā nīlaṃ pītarūpeṇa /
SA15bsa075_u:5468: avadhyapratibhāse tu bhedapratibhāsābhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇabhedapratibhāsābhāvavat siddha eva /
SA15bsa075_u:5469: evamanena pramāṇena santānāntarasya svacittāpekṣayā bhede pratikṣipte abhede ca svayamevāsaṃbhavini bhedābhedābhyāmavācyatvaṃ siddham /
SA15bsa075_u:5474: api ca santānāntare tāvadarvāgdṛśāṃ sandeho bhavadbhiranumanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:5477: vidyamānameva kadācit santānāntaraṃ bhagavatā nāvadhāryate tathāpyasau sarvajña iti kathametat /
SA15bsa075_u:5480: pratyakṣeṇa paracittapratītau grāhyagrāhakabhāvo 'pi paracittasya bhagavaccittena sahāyāta iti bahirarthavāda eva mukhāntareṇopagataḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:5484: yāvacca bhedagrahaṇābhimānarūpā saṃvṛsttitāvat santānāntare sandehāttadavabodhanārthaṃ vacanādirapi pravartata iti svavacanavirodho 'pi na saṃbhavatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:5485: na khalu santānāntaraviṣayaḥ sarvathā sandeho nāstyevetyabhimatamasmākam,
SA15bsa075_u:5487: idaṃ hi santānāntarābhāvasādhanamadvayasādhanena sādhāraṇamiti naikaniyataḥ svavacanādivirodhastatparihāro vā /
SA15bsa075_u:5488: citrākārasaṃbhavamātreṇāpi ca vedāntadhvāntāpasāro bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ / tathā ca
SA15bsa075_u:5489: ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ sa ca nānyasya kasyacit
SA15bsa075_u:5492: na citrākārasaṃvedanāt ityādi dveṣavikaluṣāśeṣā eva tuṣākāro 'pi vedāntasiddhānta iti alakṣita tadgranthānutthāpayantī santānāntarāpekṣayā paṭhitavatītyavasthā (?)
